column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2020
column14: This is my all time favorite lipstick. It's perfect. PERIOD. But I could no longer find it in stores. I ended up buying three of these because the price was so good (compared to what I could find other places online.) All three arrived safely and weren't damaged. I'm so happy. Would absolutely purchase again.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
column14: Love the color. Love the creamy smooth but matte finish. Feels like nothing on your lips. This color has been impossible to find locally. I don’t love that the lipstick was broken when I received it. It’s completely broken off at the base and has to be shaken out of the lid whenever I want to use it

column14: I love this color.  I just feel pretty when I wear it.  It's a very long lasting product and does not stain your lips, like some of the long wear products out there.
